mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_banner( banner_name, banner_url, created_date, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{banner_name}, #{banner_url}, now(), now() )
INSERT INTO tb_banner_img( banner_sid, original_name, img_name, extension ) VALUES ( #{banner_sid}, #{original_name}, #{img_name}, #{extension} )
mapper.select: SELECT TB.*,BI.img_name FROM tb_banner as TB LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_banner_img as BI ON TB.banner_sid = BI.banner_sid ORDER BY TB.banner_sid DESC
